item.title: use acme.sh to generate pan-domain ssl
item.description: download acme.sh curl https://get.acme.sh | sh goto acme.sh directory cd ~/.acme.sh add issued domain ./acme.sh --issue --dns -d "*.domain" --yes-I-know-dns-manual-mode-enough-go-ahead-please add txt dns record then renew ./acme.sh --issue --dns -d "*.domain" --yes-I-know-dns-manual-mode-enough-go-ahead-please --renew config nginx ssl_certificate /path/*.domain/fullchain.cer; ssl_certificate_key /path/*.domain/*.domain.key;
